AT.name: Freedom Planet
AT.description: Kämpfe dich durch die Fantasiewelt von Avalice, in der Katzen grün sind, Motorräder Wände erklimmen und knallharte Mädchen es so richtig krachen lassen. Freedom Planet ist ein buntes Jump’n’Run, das eine feurige Drachendame und ihre Freunde gegen eine außerirdische Streitmacht in den Kampf schickt. Als Lilac bezwingst du Gegner mit deiner Mähne oder nutzt den Dragon Boost, um kometengleich durch die Luft zu donnern. Als Carol rauschst du mit Tritten und Fausthieben durch Gegnermassen, oder beschwörst ein Motorrad, das Wände und sogar Decken hinauffahren kann. Als Milla rufst du magische Blöcke herbei, die Gegner aus dem Weg räumen oder als Seelenschild ihre Angriffe abwehren. Hilf Lilac und ihren Freunden im Adventure Modus, die Welt vor dem Krieg zu retten. Stürz' dich in animierte Filmsequenzen mit Sprachausgabe – oder ohne Umschweife in die Schlacht, denn im Classic Modus reiht sich ein Level an das nächste. Hast du das Zeug dazu, Avalice vor dem Zorn des Lord Brevon und seinen Robo-Dienern zu retten?

AU.name: Freedom Planet
AU.description: Fight your way across the celestial world of Avalice where cats are green, motorcycles drive up walls and monster girls do most of the buttkicking! Freedom Planet is a cartoony, combat-based platform adventure that pits a spunky dragonoid and her friends against an alien attack force. * As Lilac, you can whip enemies with your hair or use the Dragon Boost to fly through the air at high speed like a comet. * As Carol, you can bust through foes with a flurry of punches and kicks or summon a motorcycle that lets you ride up walls and ceilings. * As Milla, you can summon blocks to throw at enemies or reflect their attacks back at them with a psychic shield. Help Lilac and friends save their world from war in an engaging Adventure mode with fully voiced cutscenes, or skip the fluff and play each stage in order with Classic mode. Do you have what it takes to save Avalice from the wrath of Lord Brevon and his robotic minions?

BG.name: Freedom Planet
BG.description: Fight your way across the celestial world of Avalice where cats are green, motorcycles drive up walls and monster girls do most of the buttkicking! Freedom Planet is a cartoony, combat-based platform adventure that pits a spunky dragonoid and her friends against an alien attack force. * As Lilac, you can whip enemies with your hair or use the Dragon Boost to fly through the air at high speed like a comet. * As Carol, you can bust through foes with a flurry of punches and kicks or summon a motorcycle that lets you ride up walls and ceilings. * As Milla, you can summon blocks to throw at enemies or reflect their attacks back at them with a psychic shield. Help Lilac and friends save their world from war in an engaging Adventure mode with fully voiced cutscenes, or skip the fluff and play each stage in order with Classic mode. Do you have what it takes to save Avalice from the wrath of Lord Brevon and his robotic minions?

BE.name: Freedom Planet
BE.description: Freedom Planet est un jeu de plate-forme de combat inspiré de dessins animés où une dragonoïde téméraire et ses amies affrontent une attaque d'aliens. * Avec Lilac, tu peux fouetter tes ennemis avec tes cheveux ou utiliser le Dragon Boost pour voler dans les airs à la vitesse d'une comète. * Avec Carol, tu peux écraser tes ennemis avec une pluie de coups de pied et de coups de poing, ou faire apparaître une moto avec laquelle tu pourras rouler sur les murs et le plafond. * Avec Milla, tu peux faire apparaître des blocks que tu peux jeter sur tes ennemis ou leur renvoyer leurs propres attaques avec un bouclier psychique. Aide Lilac et ses amies à sauver leur monde de la guerre dans un mode Aventure entrainant avec des cut-scenes entièrement doublées, ou alors joue chaque étape dans l'ordre avec le mode Classic. Est-ce que tu as les tripes pour sauver Avalice de la colère de Lord Brevon et de ses robots domestiques?

ES.name: Freedom Planet
ES.description: Combate a través del mundo celestial de Avalice donde los gatos son verdes, las motocicletas manejan por las paredes y niñas monstruo hacen la mayoría de los combates! Freedom Planet es una aventura de plataformas dibujos animados, basada en el combate que enfrenta a un Dragonoid valiente y sus amigas contra una fuerza de ataque extraterrestre. * Como Lilac, usted puede azotar a los enemigos con tu pelo o utilizar el Dragon Boost para volar por el aire a alta velocidad como un cometa. * Como Carol, puede reventar a través enemigos con una serie de golpes y patadas o convocar a una motocicleta que le permite manejar arriba las paredes y los techos. * Como Milla, puedes invocar bloques para lanzar a los enemigos o reflejar sus ataques hacia ellos con un escudo psíquico. Ayuda Lilac y sus amigas salvar su mundo de la guerra en un modo aventura cautivadora con escenas totalmente expresadas, o omitir las escenas y juegan cada fase en orden con el modo classico. ¿Tienes lo que se necesita para salvar Avalice de la ira del Lord Brevon y sus secuaces robóticos?

IT.name: Freedom Planet
IT.description: Combatti e fatti strada nel celestiale mondo di Avalice, dove i gatti sono verdi, le motociclette scalano pareti e le ragazze mostro sono delle vere dure! Freedom Planet è una avventura platform dallo stile cartoonesco piena di emozionanti combattimenti, che vede un'energetica dragonoide e le sue amiche affrontare una forza d'attacco aliena. Come Lilac, usa i capelli per frustare i nemici o librati in aria a gran velocità come una cometa con il Dragon Boost. Come Carol, sfonda le linee nemiche con raffiche di pugni e calci o evoca una motocicletta che puoi usare per scalare pareti e correre sui soffitti. Come Milla, evoca blocchi da lanciare contro i nemici o usa il tuo scudo psichico per rispedire i loro attacchi al mittente. Aiuta Lilac e le sue amiche a salvare il loro mondo dalla guerra nella coinvolgente modalità Avventura con scene di intermezzo completamente doppiate, o vai dritto al punto e gioca i livelli uno dopo l'altro nella modalità Classica. Riuscirai a salvare Avalice dalla collera di Lord Brevon e dai suoi scagnozzi robotici?

NL.name: Freedom Planet
NL.description: Vecht je weg door de magische wereld van Avalice! Waar motors langs de muur omhoog kunnen rijden, katten groen zijn en de monster-meisjes de meeste klappen uitdelen! Freedom Planet is een tekenfilmachtig avontuur waarin een draak-achtige en haar vrienden tegen een buitenaards leger moeten vechten. * Als Lilac kan je vijanden verslaan met je zweep, of je Dragon-boost gebruiken om als een komeet door de lucht te vliegen. * Als Carol kan je je vijanden verslinden met een barrage van slagen en schoppen, of een motor tevoorschijn halen waarmee je over de muren en plafonden kunt rijden. * Als Milla kan je blokken tevoorschijn halen die je naar vijanden kan gooien, of een psychisch schild maken om hun aanvallen terug te reflecteren. Help Lilac en haar vrienden hun wereld te redden van een oorlog in de Adventure-modus, met volledige voice-over tijdens de cutscenes. Of sla alle extra poespas over en speel level na level in volgorde in de Classic modus. Heb jij wat nodig is om Avalice te redden van Heer Brevon's ijzeren greep?

NZ.name: Freedom Planet
NZ.description: Fight your way across the celestial world of Avalice where cats are green, motorcycles drive up walls and monster girls do most of the buttkicking! Freedom Planet is a cartoony, combat-based platform adventure that pits a spunky dragonoid and her friends against an alien attack force. * As Lilac, you can whip enemies with your hair or use the Dragon Boost to fly through the air at high speed like a comet. * As Carol, you can bust through foes with a flurry of punches and kicks or summon a motorcycle that lets you ride up walls and ceilings. * As Milla, you can summon blocks to throw at enemies or reflect their attacks back at them with a psychic shield. Do you have what it takes to save Avalice from the wrath of Lord Brevon and his robotic minions?

PT.name: Freedom Planet
PT.description: Combate através do mundo celestial de Avalice, onde gatos são verdes, motos sobem paredes e raparigas-monstro tratam da maior parte da pancadaria! Freedom Planet é um jogo de aventura e plataformas com foco em combate e arte estilo "cartoon" que põe uma dragonóide energética e as suas amigas contra uma força alienígena! * Como Lilac, podes chicotear inimigos com o teu cabelo ou usar o Dragon Boost para voar pelo ar a alta velocidade como um cometa. * Como Carol, podes irromper por entre inimigos com uma série de murros e pontapés ou invocar uma mota que te permite subir paredes e tectos. * Como Milla, podes invocar blocos para atirar a inimigos ou reflectir os ataques deles de volta com um escudo psíquico. Ajuda a Lilac e amigas a salvar o seu mundo de uma guerra num captivante modo de Aventura, ou ignora tudo isso e joga cada nível em ordem com o modo Clássico. Será que tens o que é preciso para salvar Avalice da fúria de Lorde Brevon e os seus capangas robóticos?

RU.name: Freedom Planet
RU.description: Борьба свой путь через небесной мире Avalice где кошки зеленые, мотоциклы подъехать стены и чудовище девушки делают большую часть buttkicking! Свобода Планета является мультяшных, боевая платформа на базе приключение, которое рождает пылкий Dragonoid и ее друзей против пришельцев силу атаки. * Как сирень, вы можете сделать на скорую врагов ваших волос или использовать подталкивание дракон летать по воздуху на высокой скорости, как комета. * Как Кэрол, вы можете бюст через врагов шквал ударов руками и ногами или вызвать мотоцикл, который позволяет ездить до стен и потолков. * Как Milla, вы можете вызвать блоки, чтобы бросить на врагов или отражать их атаки обратно на них с психической щита. Помощь Сирень и друзей сохранить свой мир от войны в привлекательной режиме Приключение с полностью озвученных роликах, или пропустить пух и играть каждый этап в порядке с классическом режиме. Есть ли у вас что требуется, чтобы сохранить Avalice от гнева Господа Brevon и его приспешников роботов?

SE.name: Freedom Planet
SE.description: Fight your way across the celestial world of Avalice where cats are green, motorcycles drive up walls and monster girls do most of the buttkicking! Freedom Planet is a cartoony, combat-based platform adventure that pits a spunky dragonoid and her friends against an alien attack force. * As Lilac, you can whip enemies with your hair or use the Dragon Boost to fly through the air at high speed like a comet. * As Carol, you can bust through foes with a flurry of punches and kicks or summon a motorcycle that lets you ride up walls and ceilings. * As Milla, you can summon blocks to throw at enemies or reflect their attacks back at them with a psychic shield. Help Lilac and friends save their world from war in an engaging Adventure mode with fully voiced cutscenes, or skip the fluff and play each stage in order with Classic mode. Do you have what it takes to save Avalice from the wrath of Lord Brevon and his robotic minions?
